welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mingaora, where the stunning natural beauty of Swat Valley and the rich cultural heritage await you. Take your time to explore our charming city and enjoy everything it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Cafe de Suvastu
restaurants.description: Cafe de Suvastu is a café located in Swat.

restaurants.name: Shiraz 2
restaurants.description: Shiraz 2 is a asian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: The Cafe Royal
restaurants.description: The Cafe Royal is a cafeteria located in Saidu Sharif, Swat.
restaurants.address: Near Swat Serena (Opposite to King Hospital), Saidu Sharif, Swat-19200

restaurants.name: G Kurban
restaurants.description: G Kurban is a afghan restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Hujra Restaurant Swat
restaurants.description: Hujra Restaurant Swat is a pakistani restaurant located in Mingora.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi for up to 2 hours.
